title: Hey, Teacher!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Hey, Miako. What about this one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>This “I told” is modifying this “who”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh.... What do you mean? There are so many words in a row, Kasumin doesn’t get it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>You can break it down like.... Wait, geez~! Why am I looking at your homework, Kasumi!? I came all the way here to play!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well~, you’re a third year, a university student back in the states, and my senior, right? So it’s your duty to help your cute junior out with her homework~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Alright. I’ll be strict just like a senior would then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I won’t let you snack before you get it right. Poor you. I even bought a bunch of really delicious cookies. I guess you can’t eat them now~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No, wait! Kasumin will finish up soon, so don’t eat them yet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Whatever should I do~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
